resources.string: There is a new alarm notification message
Drop down to search for local device.
Drop down to search for device.
The account information isn\'t editted, using the default account.
The device ID can\'t be empty
The device address can\'t be empty
Please pull down the screen to try to connect again. If failed, please check your network connection.
Do you like to clean device list?
Do you like to delete the device?
WIFI mode or configuration of the device is changed. Do you like to open network setting to change your WIFI connection?
Warm tips: Headend equipment is in AP hot spot mode. If you need to connect to it, please click "confirm" to change you WIFI connection configuration.
Server is busy now, please try again later.
Connection to the front end device has disconnected.
AP password is required to be empty or greater than or equal to 8 characters.
Station password is required to be empty or greater than or equal to 8 characters.
Password is required to be empty or greater than or equal to 8 characters.
User name or password is wrong.
The front end device is offline.
The front end device version doesn\'t support.
Network connection is unuseful, please check network setting.
The device list is empty, please add device
Do you like to quit the program?
Connection to the front end device has disconnected.
AP mode (hot spot mode. router is not required)
Obtaining alarm and notification settings messages…
Obtaining alarm and notification settings failed
Local WIFI device list. Please choose one.
Start time cannot be greater than End time.
End time cannot be less than Start time.
Search failed: Connection to device failed.
Search completed: Do not find the file you are looking for
SD card read and write exception
Drop down to load more alarm messages.
Drop down to load more alarm information.
Release to load more alarm information…
New version is available. Do you like to update now?
WIFI in your mobile phone hasn\'t been started. Please start WIFI in your mobile phone and then connect to your router to operate. Whether to start WIFI?
Switch mode successfully, please click Search switch to search for device later
Screenshot has been already saved in SD card
File has been saved in SD card
Picture is saved and can be viewed in Photo.
Pressing direction key or scrolling the screen can adjust the direction of the lens
Device has been added to list
List already exists for this device
Device ID can\'t be empty and the length of ID can\'t be longer than nine numbers
Be greater to horizontally view HD video
Please choose device need to configure
Please enter the name and password of the device router
(Tip: Please use mobile phone within 3 meters from router for better signal)
Please close the mobile phone to the device and click the send vioce wave switch
Please turn the mobile phone\'s speaker on the microphone of device(in 15cm)
Send the voice wave, complete to send and please wait. When listen to the voice prompts the device is configured successfully, click the next step
This device does not allow to turn
When listen to the device notices configuration update, click Next Step or click Back to send voice wave again
Please wait until WIFI is connected.
The software has no root to open WIFI, please manually open to try again
Please use the thimble to insert device reset button, listen to the device voice wave configuration is open and then click the next step
Connect 4 points at least, please try again
AP mode does not support update
Searching for a new version, whether to update?
You have entered the wrong password too many times. Please try later.
The password you entered is wrong. Please enter again.
Enter 4 points at least, please enter again
Due to differ from the last draw, please draw again
Set gesture password to prevent others to view without authorization
Updating version… Please don\'t disconnect the power.
Obtaining device information successfully can real time preview or add to the device list
New and old passwords can\'t be the same.
Do you like to update software?
No longer to prompt for this version
Setting and fixing position of preset position
Device obtaining failed, please made sure your device has been triggered or added and then try again
Searching for alarm device, please trigger alarm device you need to add
The name you entered is too long. Please try again.
Configuration will be completed in 80s, please wait pactiently
Connection signal between device and router is too weak or password is wrong.
Japan, Korea, China Taiwan, China HongKong, Thailand, Vietnam
Device network connection failed, please check your network and then try again
Obtaining result device returned to failed
Formatting SD card… Please wait until format is complete.
Format will delete all files in SD card. Do you like to format?
(WIFI Smart-Link: Configure network for the first time and reset device)
Putting QR/bar code in frame can scan automatically
Current device network mode is UNKNOW mode
Current device network mode is STATION mode
Current device network mode is AP mode
Current device has no new alarm message
This device has no preset position function
Cameras permissions exception, this function can\'t be used
Cameras permissions exception, you need to open camera permission in [Settings-Application-demo-Permission]
Turning off the mobile phone authority will affect the progarm alarm information push function normal operation, please open the mobile phone authority in [Settings-Application-demo-Permission]
Turning off the storage space authority will result the progarm data to read and store function abnormal, please open the storage space authority in [Settings-Application-demo-Permission]
The storage space permissions exception, unable to store the read data, you need to open the storage space authority in [Settings-Application-demo-Permission]
Microphone permissions exception, this function can\'t be used
Microphone permissions exception, this function can\'t be used, you need to open microphone authority in [Settings-Application-demo-Permission]
Turning off the position information permissions will affect program search device/hot spot function, please open position information authority in [Settings-Application-demo-Permission]
Please open GPS position switch, otherwise application won\'t obtain device hot spot information
Please enter verification code with correct format
Remarks: Password is made of numbers, letters, special characters or hybrid combination; 6~14 characters
Remarks: Password is made of numbers, letters, special characters or hybrid combination; 6~14 characters
Verification code is out of time
Please enter 6~14 bit password with correct format
Please enter user name with correct format
The two passwords entered does not match
Please enter mailbox address with correct format
Device list has been the latest
User name or password is incorrect
Verify through mobile phone or mailbox
Password is made of numbers, letters, special characters or combination of them; 6~14 characters
Network error! Please check network connection or try later
Register successfully. Jump to login terrance after two seconds
Email sent successfully, please go to mailbox to confirm modify
Please go to mailbox to activate user
Mailbox validation, no need for verification code
The device hasn\'t binded service, please bind service
Please login to use this feature
Network error! Obtaining user device list failed, please try later
The device list has already been the latest
ID information is out of date, please login again
Obtaining account cloud service list information failed
Obtaining cloud service information device binded failed
You haven\'t bought any cloud service currently, please go to buy service
Service device binded is out of date
Obtaining verification code failed, please try later
Verification code is out of date
Obtaining service list failed, please check your network or try later
This cloud service package has been binded to other devices
This device has binded cloud service package
Due to the device does not support cloud service, binding failed
Please enter verification code with 6 numbers
After record, recording files will be saved in SD card root directory:/SDcard/demo/
Server is busy, please try later
Server is busy. Obtaining user device list failed, please try later
Binding Cloud storage service package failed
Binding Cloud storage service package succeeded
Connecting to device failed, please try later
Search for recording files failed, please try later
Current recording file is the last one
Current recording file is the first one
Current user is mailbox registration user. Clicking "Confirm" will send E-mail to your mailbox, please go to mailbox to confirm unbind
E-mail sent successfully, please go to mailbox to confirm
Current user does not add device
The user is binding Cloud storage service for this device, please try later
Modifying password failed, please try later
Sending verifacation failed, please try later
The logon failed, please try later
E-Mail sent successfully, please go to the mailbox to activate the user
Please enter WIFI password with 8 characters
Current device can\'t support microphone feature
Unbinding Cloud service package probably leads Cloud storage recording files be cleaned, whether to unbind?
ID information error! Adding device to user device list failed, please search for device in device list
Server is busy! Adding device to user device list failed, please search for device in device list
Network error! Adding device to user device list failed, please search for device in device list
Adding device to user device list failed, please search device in device list
In login mode, mobile phone connecting to device hot spot to search device can\'t add device to user device list, please switch to Station mode or use "local login" mode
Obtaining binded service information of device failed
Please wait to record after video begins to play
Not enough storage space leads no download
Please wait download tasks end or are cancelled and then click to enter recording playback
Download tasks are too many at the same time, please wait
The current device does not have a password yet, in order to protect your privacy, please set one.
Failed to load alarm image, please try again later…
Start time and end time can NOT be the same
Device does NOT support customize settings, please upgrade device
The time quantum is max already
Please login to use this function
The device is not binding with cloud service yet
please turn on Alarm on/Alarm off
Device does NOT support Alarm Area settings.
Sorry, there is no successful jump interface,please click on the payment manually
If the configuration is successful, there is no successful jump, please manually return to the device list
In order to ensure your viewing experience, please allow microphone permission.
Hardware decode failed, use software decoding
Alipay isn\'t installed, please try again after installation
The password consists of 6–30–bit characters that contain at least two or more letters, numbers, or special characters, and is case sensitive.
Password strength is too weak, please to follow the rules to improve the encrypt intensity.
Password length doesn\'t meet the requirements, please try again.
1.There\'s someone in the picture， but the red box doesn\'t select one
2.There\'s nobody in the picture， but the red box still select something
The alarm area can not be empty, please try again.
Your feedback on wrong alarm will help us improve accuracy.
The password can not be empty, please try again.
You have successfully purchased\n the cloud storage service\n Do you want to active it immediately？
